description: Adds, gets, and deletes users for a user group.

post.description: Adds users to an existing user group.

id.description:
(Optional) Provide user ID to add user into the group.
To fetch the users within a tenant, use the Search Users API.

delete.description: Deletes users from an existing user group.

id.description:
(Optional) Provide user ID to add user into the group.
To fetch the users within a tenant, use the Search Users API

get.description: Gets users for a user group.

email.description: Email of the user. (Alert and report notifications are sent to the email address.)

country.description: Country name. To get the list of countries, use Get Countries API.

timeZone.description:
Time zone of the country. Use the Get Timezones API to get the list of timezones.

Example: "timeZone": { "code": "EST"}

userNotifications.description: (Optional) Email to which the alert and report notifications are sent.

roles.description: (Optional) Defines permission sets to user and user groups on devices and device groups. Assign roles to a user. See Search Roles API to get roles created under a partner or client.

userGroups.description: (Optional) Assign users to specific user groups. Provide name of the user group.Use Search User Groups API to get details of user groups.

password\t.description:
Password must have a minimum of 7 characters with at least:
- One number (0-9)
- One special character (#,!, $,*)
- One lowercase (a-z)
- One uppercase (A-Z) character

userGroupType.description:
(Optional) Assign users to all user groups, or specific users groups. A user can also be an individual user, NOT being part of any user group.
Supported Values: ALL, NONE
- If a user should be part of all user groups, provide userGroupType: ALL
- If a user should be part of a specific user group, provide user group name.
Example:"userGroups": [{ "name": "Luminalto Admins" }]
- If a user should NOT be part of any user group, provide userGroupType: NONE
